DataSourcePortable.Name: Compras
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="--SELECT CASE
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'JAN'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'FEV'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'MAR'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'ABR'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'MAI'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'JUN'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'JUL'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'AGO'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'SET'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'OUT'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'NOV'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'DEZ'
-- END
-- + '/' +
-- CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), RIGHT(DATEPART(YEAR, OC.DATAINCLUSAO), 2)) AS DATA,
-- SUM(OC.VALORTOTAL) VALORTOTAL
-- FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRA OC
-- WHERE OC.FORNECEDOR IN (1)
-- GROUP BY CASE
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'JAN'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'FEV'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'MAR'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'ABR'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'MAI'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'JUN'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'JUL'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'AGO'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'SET'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'OUT'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 1 THEN 'NOV'
-- WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATEPART(MONTH, OC.DATAINCLUSAO)) = 2 THEN 'DEZ'
-- END
-- + '/' +
-- CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),
-- RIGHT(DATEPART(YEAR,
-- OC.DATAINCLUSAO),
-- 2)),
-- OC.VALORTOTAL 
SELECT DATAINCLUSAO, SUM(VALORTOTAL) VALORTOTAL FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRA WHERE FORNECEDOR IN (1)
GROUP BY DATAINCLUSAO
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="DATAINCLUSAO" From="A" Path="DATAINCLUSAO" /> <Field Alias="VALORTOTAL" From="A" Path="VALORTOTAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
